description: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon [flinch]{mechanic:flinch} with each hit.
Summons [rain]{mechanic:rain} that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} after each turn.
Protects against [critical hits]{mechanic:critical-hit}.
Prevents being KOed from full [HP]{mechanic:hp}, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.
Prevents []{move:self-destruct}, []{move:explosion}, and []{ability:aftermath} from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
Prevents [paralysis]{mechanic:paralysis}.
Increases [evasion]{mechanic:evasion} to 1.25× during a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm}.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
Has a 30% chance of [paralyzing]{mechanic:paralysis} attacking Pokémon on contact.
Absorbs []{type:electric} moves, healing for 1/4 max [HP]{mechanic:hp}.
Absorbs []{type:water} moves, healing for 1/4 max [HP]{mechanic:hp}.
Prevents [infatuation]{mechanic:infatuation} and protects against []{move:captivate}.
Negates all effects of [weather]{mechanic:weather}, but does not prevent the weather itself.
Increases moves' [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} to 1.3×.
Prevents [sleep]{mechanic:sleep}.
Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.
Prevents [poison]{mechanic:poison}.
Protects against []{type:fire} moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.
Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.
Prevents [confusion]{mechanic:confusion}.
Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.
Lowers opponents' [Attack]{mechanic:attack} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon entering battle.
Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.
Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic:hp} on contact.
Protects against damaging moves that are not [super effective]{mechanic:super-effective}.
Evades []{type:ground} moves.
Has a 30% chance of inflcting either [paralysis]{mechanic:paralysis}, [poison]{mechanic:poison}, or [sleep]{mechanic:sleep} on attacking Pokémon on contact.
Copies [burns]{mechanic:burn}, [paralysis]{mechanic:paralysis}, and [poison]{mechanic:poison} received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.
Prevents stats from being [lowered]{mechanic:stat-modifier} by other Pokémon.
Cures any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} upon switching out.
Redirects single-target []{type:electric} moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves, raising [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.
Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.
Doubles [Speed]{mechanic:speed} during [rain]{mechanic:rain}.
Doubles [Speed]{mechanic:speed} during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}.
Doubles the wild encounter rate.
Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.
Doubles [Attack]{mechanic:attack} in battle.
Has a 30% chance of [poisoning]{mechanic:poison} attacking Pokémon on contact.
Prevents [flinching]{mechanic:flinching}.
Prevents [freezing]{mechanic:freezing}.
Prevents [burns]{mechanic:burn}.
Prevents []{type:steel} opponents from fleeing or switching out.
Protects against sound-based moves.
Heals for 1/16 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn during [rain]{mechanic:rain}.
Summons a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm} that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
Increases the [PP]{mechanic:pp} cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.
Halves damage from []{type:fire} and []{type:ice} moves.
Makes [sleep]{mechanic:sleep} pass twice as quickly.
Has a 30% chance of [burning]{mechanic:burn} attacking Pokémon on contact.
Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
Prevents [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} from being [lowered]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.
Prevents [Attack]{mechanic:attack} from being [lowered]{mechanic:stat-modifiers} by other Pokémon.
Picks up other Pokémon's used and [Flung]{move:fling} held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.
Skips every second turn.
Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} to 0.8×.
Has a 30% chance of [infatuating]{mechanic:infatuation} attacking Pokémon on contact.
Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus}.
Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus}.
Changes []{pokemon:castform}'s type and form to match the [weather]{mechanic:weather}.
Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.
Has a 33% chance of curing any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} after each turn.
Increases [Attack]{mechanic:attack} to 1.5× with a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}.
Increases [Defense]{mechanic:defense} to 1.5× with a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}.
Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.
Strengthens []{type:grass} moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.
Strengthens []{type:fire} moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.
Strengthens []{type:water} moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.
Strengthens []{type:bug} moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.
Protects against recoil damage.
Summons [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight} that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.  Eluded by []{type:flying}-types and Pokémon in the air.
Prevents [sleep]{mechanic:sleep}.
Prevents stats from being [lowered]{mechanic:stat-modifier} by other Pokémon.
Doubles [Attack]{mechanic:attack} in battle.
Protects against [critical hits]{mechanic:critical-hit}.
Negates all effects of [weather]{mechanic:weather}, but does not prevent the weather itself.
Doubles [evasion]{mechanic:evasion} when [confused]{mechanic:confusion}.
Absorbs []{type:electric} moves, raising [Speed]{mechanic:speed} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.
Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.
Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon [flinching]{mechanic:flinching}.
Increases evasion to 1.25× during [hail]{mechanic:hail}.  Protects against hail damage.
Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low [HP]{mechanic:hp} below 1/2 its max HP.
Raises [Attack]{mechanic:attack} to the maximum of six [stages]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon receiving a [critical hit]{mechanic:critical-hit}.
Doubles [Speed]{mechanic:speed} upon using or losing a held item.
Halves damage from []{type:fire} moves and [burns]{mechanic:burn}.
Doubles the Pokémon's [stat modifiers]{mechanic:stat-modifiers}.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

Causes 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} in damage each turn during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}, but heals for 1/8 max HP during [rain]{mechanic:rain}.  Increases damage from []{type:fire} moves to 1.25×, but absorbs []{type:water} moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.
Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon entering battle.
Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2× their power.
Heals for 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn when [poisoned]{mechanic:poison} in place of damage.
Increases the [same-type attack bonus]{mechanic:same-type-attack-bonus} from 1.5× to 2×.
Extends two-to-five-hit moves and []{move:triple-kick} to their full length every time.
Cures any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} after each turn during [rain]{mechanic:rain}.
Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}.
Increases [Speed]{mechanic:speed} to 1.5× with a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}.
Makes the Pokémon's moves all act []{type:normal}-type.
Strengthens [critical hits]{mechanic:critical-hit} to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.
Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.
Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.
Makes the Pokémon move last within its move's priority bracket.
Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.
Protects against [major status ailments]{mechanic:major-status-ailments} during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}.
Prevents the Pokémon from using its held item in battle.
Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.
Raises moves' [critical hit]{mechanic:critical-hit} rates one stage.
Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max [HP]{mechanic:hp} when knocked out by a contact move.
Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a [super-effective]{mechanic:super-effective} move, []{move:self-destruct}, []{move:explosion}, or a one-hit KO move.
Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.
Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.
Doubles damage inflicted with [not-very-effective]{mechanic:not-very-effective} moves.
Decreases damage taken from [super-effective]{mechanic:super-effective} moves by 1/4.
Halves [Attack]{mechanic:attack} and [Speed]{mechanic:speed} for five turns upon entering battle.
Lets the Pokémon's []{type:normal} and []{type:fighting} moves hit []{type:ghost} Pokémon.
Redirects single-target []{type:water} moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Water moves, raising [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.

Changes []{pokemon:arceus}'s type and form to match its held Plate.
Increases friendly Pokémon's [Attack]{mechanic:attack} and [Special Defense]{mechanic:special-defense} to 1.5× during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}.
Damages [sleeping]{mechanic:sleep} opponents for 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn.
Steals attacking Pokémon's held items on contact.
Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.

Raises [Attack]{mechanic:attack} two [stages]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon having any stat lowered.
Halves [Attack]{mechanic:attack} and [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} at 50% max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.
Has a 30% chance of [Disabling]{move:disable} any move that hits the Pokémon.
Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} after each turn.
Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.
Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} and lowers [Defense]{mechanic:defense} by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.
Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5× when [burned]{mechanic:burn}.
Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.
Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.
Raises a random stat two [stages]{mechanic:stat-modifier} and lowers another one stage after each turn.

Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} to exactly 50%.
Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.
Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokémon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move.

Bypasses []{move:light-screen}, []{move:reflect}, and []{move:safeguard}.
Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.
Raises [Attack]{mechanic:attack} one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.

Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier} upon being hit by a []{type:dark}, []{type:ghost}, or []{type:bug} move.
Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.

Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage.
Strengthens []{type:rock}, []{type:ground}, and []{type:steel} moves to 1.3× their power during a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm}.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic:hp} on contact.
Changes []{pokemon:darmanitan}'s form after each turn depending on its [HP]{mechanic:hp}: Zen Mode below 50% max HP, and Standard Mode otherwise.
Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.
Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.
Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.
Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.
Protects friendly []{type:grass} Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.
Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.
Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.
Halves damage from physical attacks.
Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:ice} moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
Prevents friendly Pokémon from sleeping.
Changes []{pokemon:aegislash} to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using []{move:kings-shield}.
Raises []{type:flying} moves' priority by one stage.
Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.
Boosts Defense while []{move:grassy-terrain} is in effect.
Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

Turns the bearer's []{type:normal} moves into []{type:fairy} moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.
Strengthens []{type:dark} moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
Strengthens []{type:fairy} moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
Makes []{ability:dark-aura} and []{ability:fairy-aura} weaken moves of their respective types.
Creates heavy rain, which has all the properties of Rain Dance, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.
Creates extremely harsh sunlight, which has all the properties of Sunny Day, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Water moves to fail.
Creates a mysterious air current, which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokémon.
Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.
This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.
This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.
Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form.  Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.
This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.
This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.
Raises this Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.
During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.
This Pokémon's moves do not make contact.
Sound-based moves become Water-type.
This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.
This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2×.
Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.
Wishiwashi becomes Schooling Form when its HP is 25% or higher.
Prevents the first instance of battle damage.
Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.
Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.
This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.
This Pokémon always  acts as though it were Asleep.
Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.
Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.
When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.
When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Electric Terrain.
When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.
When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.
When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.
Other Pokémon cannot lower this Pokémon's stats.
When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage from moves is halved.
Reduces super-effective damage to 0.75×.
Increases super-effective damage dealt to 1.25×.
The power of Steel-type moves used by a Pokémon with Steely Spirit and its allies is increased by 50%.
When the Pokémon with Perish Body is hit with a contact move, both the attacker and the Pokémon with Perish Body will faint in three turns
Prevents the Pokémon with this Ability and its allies from being afflicted by poison.
When a Pokémon with this Ability enters the battle, stat stages of ally Pokémon are reset to 0.
raises the user's Special Attack by one stage every time another Pokémon faints, which includes its allies and opponents.
